A maximum approximately 200 subject enter open-label safety efficacy extension study LCP AtorFen-2001 double-blind study . All subject enrol study receive open-label LCP-AtorFen combination therapy . Visit 1 extension study corresponds last visit double-blind study ( Visit 6 Week 12 ) .
